name: Be Happy
description:
A game where you have to keep your cursor inside a moving circle to collect items like coffee, cake or cute cats. Have fun with the items exploding into praise and motivating quotes helping you to keep the positive attitude going.

Tutorial:

Keep your cursor inside the circle for as long as possible.

If your mouse gets outside of the circle try not to label it as a good or a bad thing.

Let it pass and go back to following the circle again.

Audio is sort of broken on windows, so get the audio experience in the video.
